description:
The fight between CF Club and the student council begins. What are the hidden feelings of the Maki Nagashiro, secretary, towards Naoki? Will the fearsome ability of Eru Nakagami from the paranormal power research society bear its fangs against Shingo again?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Evil-Eyed Prince from Another World Sings of the Strongest Hero and Love
Isekai Tensei Shita Jagan no Ouji wa, Saikyou Yuusha to Ai o Utau
異世界転生した邪眼の王子は, 最強勇者と愛を謳う
